full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHAMS GSUM BDUD 'DUL SPRIN RING RGYAL PO'I BSKANG BA 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI'I RIN CHEN 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @025A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG YID BZHIN NOR BU KHAMS GSUM BDUD 'DUL SPRIN RING RGYAL PO 'DI NYID LA SHES NAS DAD PA CUNG ZAD THOB PA'I ^ BTZUN GZUGS AARTHA SIDHA BADZRA GYIS BLA BRANG RDO RJE PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG @026A *, ,BSTAN DANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,PAR GYI YI GE PA NI RAB 'BYAMS PA DGE SLONG SBYIN PA RGYAL MTSAN NO, ,)
